face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Employment interview is the process of transferring information between interviewers and interviewees.
sentences.chinese: 面试是面试官与应聘者进行面对面交流的过程。

sentences.english: The bird and magpie lives face to face and they become neighbor.
sentences.chinese: 寒号鸟和喜鹊面对面住着，成了邻居。

sentences.english: Perhaps in a revolving door ever being face to face.
sentences.chinese: 在旋转门面对面的那一刹。

sentences.english: Career Fairs are a great way to network face-to-face with local and national employers.
sentences.chinese: 招聘会是和本地及全国的雇主面对面交流的好机会。

sentences.english: Also, people are just as complicated on either side of an online conversation as they are on either side of a f2f interaction.
sentences.chinese: 人们的在线交流也与真实的面对面交流一样复杂。

sentences.english: The network teaching means that the teachers and the students rely on the media to carry out the non face-to-face education.
sentences.chinese: 网络教学是指师生凭借媒体所进行的非面对面的教育。

sentences.english: Suddenly Ruz came face to face with a human skull!
sentences.chinese: 鲁茨突然发觉自己面对面地站在一个骷髅前。

sentences.english: There's no substitute for a face-to-face conversation.
sentences.chinese: 没有取代面对面的交谈。

sentences.english: His dream was to meet his favourite pop star face to face.
sentences.chinese: 他的梦想是要面对面地见见他心目中的流行曲歌星。

sentences.english: The goal is to create near face-to face communication.
sentences.chinese: 他们的目标就是创建近乎面对面的沟通。

sentences.english: But face-to-face communication is a core principle of agile development.
sentences.chinese: 但是面对面的通信却是敏捷开发的一个核心原则。

sentences.english: We are just sitting face in face while I feel the largest distance.
sentences.chinese: 我们面对面对坐着然而我觉得距离却那么遥远。

sentences.english: Jang Keun Suk said face to face.
If the day comes when you meet Jing face to face, what would you say to her?
sentences.chinese: 若面对面见到张小京，你会对她说的一句话是什么？

sentences.english: After that, the three person still sitting face-to-face until go to bed.
sentences.chinese: 这三个人听了之后，又面对面的坐到晚上才回去睡觉。

definition: to talk with sb (face to face)/discussion/talk/chat
to join/to connect/to link up/to communicate
to talk (with sb)/to have a conversation/talk/conversation/CL:次[ci4]
to meet/to run into (sb)/to get together (with sb)
